**Tender Description**
----------------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites qualified firms and individuals with the knowledge and experience of Building Condition Reports and PWGSC practices to submit proposals for Standing Offers. The estimated total dollar value of all Standing Offers is
